channel.title: Remove stupid lag feature
channel.description: im using hiyascape source, and every 30mins it resets server, now when it does this it kicks everyone off, and says resetting server, but it lags my computer bad.... and im not sure people can log back on. so my question is how do i remove this reset feature?

item.title: Remove stupid lag feature
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

That will just increase the time it takes until the restart. Replace:

ResetTimer += 1;

with:

// ResetTimer += 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Remove stupid lag feature
item.dc:creator: @unkn0w3n unkn0w3n
item.description:
@unkn0w3n wrote:

Go into Antilag.java and where it says { ResetTimer += 1; if(ResetTimer >= 30000)

Change 30000 to 99999.

Read full topic
